content.text:
[@jer](@uf3kajfhBC2Sd3OysKB5LnBLJ5pwgBhBpXnGEGzgG6A=.ed25519)

I've been trying to get better about that -- feel free to flag as out-of-date (or just message me) if I'm missing a release in `ssb-patchwork`. :+1: 

I'm planning to package and release a non-bleeding-edge package for Patchwork once a new release comes out; the last release was from back in January and doesn't play nicely with the latest Node updates.

Thanks for the feedback!
